alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 10:24AM CST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Illinois... Big Muddy River near Plumfield and Murphysboro. .Recent and future rainfall in the Big Muddy basin will cause rises in the river. At Plumfield and Murphysboro, the river is forecast to rise above flood stage midweek and crest in minor flooding late this week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Some minor flooding in S 3rd & Division / Plum Street area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Monday the stage was 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 25.0 feet Friday night. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
